description: This file defines a UI fragment for displaying live TV channels in an Android TV app, including loading channels from a repository, displaying them in a list, and starting playback on click.

classes.name: LiveTvFragment
classes.description: A fragment that displays a list of live channels and handles user interaction for starting live playback.

classes.name: ChannelCardPresenter
classes.description: A custom presenter for displaying live channel cards with images and titles.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the fragment, sets adapter, and loads channels.

methods.name: loadChannels
methods.description: Fetches live channels from the repository and populates the list view.

methods.name: onItemClicked
methods.description: Handles click events on channel items, launching playback activity.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates view holders for channel cards.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds live channel data to the card views.

methods.name: onUnbindViewHolder
methods.description: Handles cleanup when view holder is unbound.
